document.full_text: silver surged as much as 8 percent on monday before pulling back sharply when a failure to pierce the all time high from 1980 unleashed a wave of technical selling amid record volume in u.s. futures.
document.title: volatile silver cuts early gain toward 1980 record
lines_and_colors: silver surged as much as 8 percent on monday before pulling back sharply when a failure to pierce the all time high from 1980 unleashed a wave of technical selling amid record volume in u.s. futures.
